description.zh-cn: 中国近代教育家、伦理学家。他曾留学日本、英国，归国后任教于湖南多所师范学校及北京大学，对毛泽东、蔡和森等学生有深刻影响。
description.en: A modern Chinese educator and ethicist. He studied in Japan and the United Kingdom. After returning to China, he taught at several normal schools in Hunan and at Peking University, profoundly influencing students like Mao Zedong and Cai Hesen.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，是杨昌济的学生和女婿。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary, politician, and political theorist, who was a student and son-in-law of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济的女儿，毛泽东的第一任妻子。
description.en: Daughter of Yang Changji and the first wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，是杨昌济的学生。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party and a student of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治活动家、学者，杨昌济的好友。
description.en: A Chinese political activist and scholar, and a good friend of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家、革命家，曾任北京大学校长，邀请杨昌济到北大任教。
description.en: A Chinese educator and revolutionary, former president of Peking University, who invited Yang Changji to teach at the university.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，杨昌济的学生。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party and a student of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代思想家、政治家，戊戌变法核心人物之一，其思想影响了杨昌济。
description.en: A modern Chinese thinker and politician, a key figure in the Hundred Days' Reform, whose ideas influenced Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 曾推荐杨昌济赴英国留学。
description.en: Recommended Yang Changji to study in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济的父亲。
description.en: Father of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济的儿子。
description.en: Son of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济的密友，两人常讨论国事。
description.en: A close friend of Yang Changji, with whom he often discussed national affairs.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南长沙的古代书院，杨昌济曾在此就读。
description.en: An ancient academy in Changsha, Hunan, where Yang Changji once studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京的教育机构，杨昌济曾在此留学。
description.en: An educational institution in Tokyo, Japan, where Yang Changji studied.

description.zh-cn: 日本的师范类高等学府，杨昌济曾在此就读。
description.en: A higher normal school in Japan where Yang Changji was a student.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国苏格兰的大学，杨昌济曾在此留学。
description.en: A university in Scotland, United Kingdom, where Yang Changji studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国苏格兰的大学，杨昌济曾在此留学并毕业。
description.en: A university in Scotland, United Kingdom, where Yang Changji studied and graduated.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南的师范学院，杨昌济曾在此任教。
description.en: A normal college in Hunan where Yang Changji taught.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南的师范学校，杨昌济曾在此任教。
description.en: A normal school in Hunan where Yang Changji taught.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南的师范学校，杨昌济曾在此任教。
description.en: A normal school in Hunan where Yang Changji taught.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名大学，杨昌济曾在此担任伦理学教授。
description.en: A renowned university in China where Yang Changji served as a professor of ethics.

description.zh-cn: 清末湖南的维新派政治团体，杨昌济曾加入。
description.en: A reformist political group in Hunan during the late Qing Dynasty, which Yang Changji joined.

description.zh-cn: 由杨昌济的学生在1918年建立的进步青年团体。
description.en: A progressive youth organization founded in 1918 by students of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪初中国学生赴法国学习和工作的运动，杨昌济曾为此运动筹措经费。
description.en: A movement in the early 20th century for Chinese students to study and work in France, for which Yang Changji helped raise funds.

description.zh-cn: 1919年中国爆发的反帝反封建的爱国运动，杨昌济曾发表文章支持学生。
description.en: An anti-imperialist, anti-feudal patriotic movement in China that broke out in 1919. Yang Changji published an article in support of the students.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省长沙市下辖县，是杨昌济的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Changsha City, Hunan Province, and the birthplace of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期设置的特别行政区，大致范围为今北京市，是杨昌济的逝世地。
description.en: A special administrative region established during the Beiyang Government of the Republic of China, roughly corresponding to present-day Beijing. It is the place of Yang Changji's death.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济出生于湖南省长沙府长沙县。
description.en: Yang Changji was born in Changsha County, Changsha Prefecture, Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 1898年，杨昌济就读于岳麓书院。
description.en: In 1898, Yang Changji studied at Yuelu Academy.

description.zh-cn: 1903年，杨昌济赴日留学，入弘文学院学习。
description.en: In 1903, Yang Changji went to study in Japan and enrolled in Kōbun Gakuin.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济在弘文学院结业后，考入东京高等师范学校。
description.en: After completing his studies at Kōbun Gakuin, Yang Changji was admitted to the Tokyo Higher Normal School.

description.zh-cn: 1909年，杨昌济赴英国阿伯丁大学攻读哲学、伦理学。
description.en: In 1909, Yang Changji went to the University of Aberdeen in the UK to study philosophy and ethics.

description.zh-cn: 1910年至1912年，杨昌济在爱丁堡大学学习文学并毕业。
description.en: From 1910 to 1912, Yang Changji studied literature and graduated from the University of Edinburgh.

description.zh-cn: 1898年在岳麓书院就读期间，杨昌济加入了进步团体南学会。
description.en: In 1898, while studying at Yuelu Academy, Yang Changji joined the progressive group Nan Xue Hui.

description.zh-cn: 1913年至1918年，杨昌济在湖南高等师范学院任教。
description.en: From 1913 to 1918, Yang Changji taught at Hunan Higher Normal College.

description.zh-cn: 1913年至1918年间，杨昌济曾在省立第四师范任教。
description.en: Between 1913 and 1918, Yang Changji taught at the Fourth Provincial Normal School.

description.zh-cn: 1913年至1918年，杨昌济在湖南省立第一师范任教。
description.en: From 1913 to 1918, Yang Changji taught at Hunan Provincial First Normal School.

description.zh-cn: 1918年，杨昌济应蔡元培邀请任北京大学伦理学教授，直至1920年去世。
description.en: In 1918, at the invitation of Cai Yuanpei, Yang Changji became a professor of ethics at Peking University, a position he held until his death in 1920.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济是杨书祥的儿子。
description.en: Yang Changji is the son of Yang Shuxiang.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济于1888年与向振熙结婚。
description.en: Yang Changji married Xiang Zhenxi in 1888.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧是杨昌济的女儿。
description.en: Yang Kaihui is the daughter of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 杨开智是杨昌济的儿子。
description.en: Yang Kaizhi is the son of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是杨昌济的女婿，与杨开慧是夫妻关系，杨昌济促成了他们的婚恋。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the son-in-law of Yang Changji and the husband of Yang Kaihui; Yang Changji facilitated their romantic relationship.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在湖南省立第一师范就读时是杨昌济的学生。
description.en: Mao Zedong was a student of Yang Changji while studying at the Hunan Provincial First Normal School.

description.zh-cn: 蔡和森是杨昌济的学生。
description.en: Cai Hesen was a student of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 邓中夏是杨昌济的学生。
description.en: Deng Zhongxia was a student of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济与章士钊是好友，临终前曾致信章士钊推荐人才。
description.en: Yang Changji and Zhang Shizhao were good friends. Before his death, Yang wrote to Zhang to recommend talented individuals.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济与密友杨守仁经常讨论国事。
description.en: Yang Changji frequently discussed national affairs with his close friend Yang Shouren.

description.zh-cn: 据毛泽东本人所述，杨昌济在北京时是其真诚的朋友。
description.en: According to Mao Zedong himself, Yang Changji was his sincere friend in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济在南学会活动期间，多次聆听谭嗣同讲演，并赞同其“以民为主”的政治思想。
description.en: During his activities with the Nan Xue Hui, Yang Changji attended Tan Sitong's lectures multiple times and agreed with his political idea of 'the people as the foundation'.

description.zh-cn: 杨毓麟于1909年推荐杨昌济赴英国阿伯丁大学留学。
description.en: In 1909, Yang Yulin recommended Yang Changji to study at the University of Aberdeen in the UK.

description.zh-cn: 章士钊于1909年推荐杨昌济赴英国阿伯丁大学留学。
description.en: In 1909, Zhang Shizhao recommended Yang Changji to study at the University of Aberdeen in the UK.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培于1918年邀请杨昌济担任北京大学伦理学教授。
description.en: In 1918, Cai Yuanpei invited Yang Changji to serve as a professor of ethics at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济曾推荐毛泽东到北京大学图书馆工作，并在1920年临终前向章士钊举荐毛泽东，称其为“海内人才”。
description.en: Yang Changji recommended Mao Zedong for a job at the Peking University Library and, before his death in 1920, recommended Mao to Zhang Shizhao, calling him a 'talent of the nation'.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济于1920年临终前向章士钊举荐蔡和森，称其为“海内人才”。
description.en: Before his death in January 1920, Yang Changji recommended Cai Hesen to Zhang Shizhao, calling him a 'talent of the nation'.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济曾为赴法勤工俭学的学生筹措经费，支持该运动。
description.en: Yang Changji raised funds for students participating in the Work-Study Program in France, supporting the movement.

description.zh-cn: 新民学会由杨昌济的学生们于1918年建立，其思想和教导对学会的成立和发展有重要影响。
description.en: The Xinmin Society was founded in 1918 by students of Yang Changji, whose ideas and teachings had a significant influence on the society's establishment and development.

description.zh-cn: 在1919年五四运动期间，杨昌济发表《告学生》一文，表达对学生的热切期望，以此支持学生运动。
description.en: During the May Fourth Movement in 1919, Yang Changji published an article titled 'To the Students,' expressing his ardent hopes for them and thereby supporting the student movement.
